csw:Record.dc:title: 10-daily Water Bodies over Africa 1km: Continents
csw:Record.dc:subject: Orthoimagery
water body
water
WB
Africa continent
Dekad
10-day composite
csw:Record.dct:abstract: WB or Water bodies is a 10-day synthesis product that detects water bodies over Africa. The product is a fusion of the former VGT4Africa Small Water Bodies and seasonality (SWB), the Global Water Watch (GWW) and a Permanent Water mask (PW) derived from Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) and Modis water mask (MOD44W). The WB products are produced by the VEGETATION image processing center (CTIV) at VITO.
